verses.verse: When Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall cut off <S%H3772><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> whose land <S%H776><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and you succeed them, <S%H3427><s%> and dwell in their cities, <S%H5892><s%> and in their houses; <S%H1004><s%>

you shall set apart <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for you in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

You shall prepare <S%H3559><s%> you the way, <S%H1870><s%> and divide the borders <S%H1366><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> causes you to inherit, <S%H5157><s%> into three parts, <S%H8027><s%> that every manslayer <S%H7523><s%> may flee there. <S%H5127><s%>

This is the case <S%H1697><s%> of the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> that shall flee <S%H5127><s%> there and live: <S%H2425><s%> whoever kills <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> unawares, <S%H1097><s%> and didn't <S%H8130><s%> hate him in time <S%H8543><s%> past; <S%H8032><s%>

as when a man goes <S%H935><s%> into the forest <S%H3293><s%> with his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> to chop <S%H2404><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and his hand <S%H3027><s%> fetches a stroke <S%H5080><s%> with the axe <S%H1631><s%> to cut down <S%H3772><s%> the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and the head <S%H1270><s%> slips <S%H5394><s%> from the handle, <S%H6086><s%> and lights <S%H4672><s%> on his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> so that he dies; <S%H4191><s%> he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of these cities <S%H5892><s%> and live: <S%H2425><s%>

lest the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> the manslayer, <S%H310><s%> while <S%H3588><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> is hot, <S%H3179><s%> and overtake <S%H5381><s%> him, <S%H1870><s%> because the way is long, <S%H7235><s%> and strike him <S%H5315><s%> mortally; <S%H5221><s%> whereas he was not worthy <S%H4941><s%> of death, <S%H4194><s%> inasmuch as <S%H3588><s%> he didn't <S%H8130><s%> hate him in time <S%H8543><s%> past. <S%H8032><s%>
Therefore I command <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> saying, You shall set apart <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities for yourselves. <S%H5892><s%>

If Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> enlarges <S%H7337><s%> your border, <S%H1366><s%> as he has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> and gives <S%H5414><s%> you all the land <S%H776><s%> which he promised <S%H1696><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers; <S%H1><s%>

if you keep <S%H8104><s%> all this commandment <S%H4687><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it, <S%H6680><s%> which I command you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and to walk <S%H3212><s%> ever <S%H3117><s%> in his ways; <S%H1870><s%> then you shall add <S%H3254><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> more for yourselves, <S%H7969><s%> besides these three:

that innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> not be shed <S%H8210><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> the midst of your land, <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and so blood be on you. <S%H1818><s%>

But if any man <S%H376><s%> hates <S%H8130><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and lies in wait <S%H693><s%> for him, <S%H6965><s%> and rises up against him, <S%H5221><s%> and strikes him mortally <S%H5315><s%> so that he dies, <S%H4191><s%> and he flees <S%H5127><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities; <S%H5892><s%>

then the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> and bring <S%H3947><s%> him there, <S%H5414><s%> and deliver him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> that he may die. <S%H4191><s%>

Your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> him, <S%H1197><s%> but you shall put away the innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that it may go well with you. <S%H2895><s%>

You shall not remove <S%H5253><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s landmark, <S%H1366><s%> which they of old time <S%H7223><s%> have set, <S%H1379><s%> in your inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which you shall inherit, <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not rise up <S%H6965><s%> against a man <S%H376><s%> for any iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> or for any sin, <S%H2403><s%> in any sin <S%H2399><s%> that he sins: <S%H2398><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> or at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> shall a matter <S%H1697><s%> be established. <S%H6965><s%>
If an unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> against any man <S%H376><s%> to testify <S%H6030><s%> against him of wrongdoing, <S%H5627><s%>

then both <S%H8147><s%> the men, <S%H582><s%> between whom the controversy <S%H7379><s%> is, <S%H5975><s%> shall stand before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the judges <S%H8199><s%> who shall be in those days; <S%H3117><s%>

and the judges <S%H8199><s%> shall make diligent <S%H3190><s%> inquisition: <S%H1875><s%> and, <S%H5707><s%> behold, if the witness is a false <S%H8267><s%> witness, <S%H5707><s%> and has testified <S%H6030><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> against his brother; <S%H251><s%>

then you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to him as he had thought <S%H2161><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to his brother: <S%H251><s%> so you shall put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

Those who remain <S%H7604><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall henceforth <S%H3254><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> no more any <S%H1697><s%> such evil <S%H7451><s%> in the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity: <S%H2347><s%> life <S%H5315><s%> for life, <S%H5315><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye, <S%H5869><s%> tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth, <S%H8127><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> for hand, <S%H3027><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%> for foot. <S%H7272><s%>
